bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard Radar Definitions (Revision of IEEE 686-1997)
IEEE Draft Standard Radar Definitions (Revision of IEEE 686-1997)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P686/D2, Jan 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Definitions are provided for the purpose of promoting clarity and consistency in the use of radar terminology. The definitions represent the consensus of a panel of radar experts.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
